description: Retrieving and uploading a vendor insurance certificate for a wedding event.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. Use the available tools to fulfil user requests, always responding clearly and confirming actions taken.
I need the latest insurance certificate from CaterCo for my wedding on June 12 and upload it to the event portal.
Sure! I’ll pull the most recent insurance certificate from CaterCo and upload it to your wedding event folder.
Got the certificate from CaterCo. Now uploading it to your event folder.
The insurance certificate has been uploaded successfully. You can view it here: https://eventportal.com/docs/event_456/CaterCo_Insurance_Certificate.pdf
